context: AI-driven intelligent data infrastructure leadership. NetApp achieved record fiscal 2025 revenues of $6.57B with 43% YoY growth in public cloud services and leading all-flash array market share gains. Positioned as intelligent data infrastructure company enabling GenAI and AI innovation. Industry transformation driven by AI/ML adoption requiring agile, secure, scalable infrastructure. Flexera acquired NetApp's Spot FinOps business in early 2025, highlighting multi-cloud cost management consolidation.
